mutants.original_line: most_frequent_dates = [date_str for date_str, freq in date_freq.items() if freq == max_freq]
mutants.mutated_line: most_frequent_dates = [date_str for (date_str, freq) in date_freq.items() if freq != max_freq]

mutants.original_line: least_frequent_dates = [date_str for date_str, freq in date_freq.items() if freq == min_freq]
mutants.mutated_line: least_frequent_dates = [date_str for (date_str, freq) in date_freq.items() if freq != min_freq]
